mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (login_id, password, name, nickname, email, phone_number, birth_date, gender, role, suspension_status, login_type, is_banned_from_auction, kakao_id) VALUES (#{loginId}, #{password}, #{name}, #{nickname}, #{email}, #{phoneNumber}, #{birthDate}, #{gender}, #{role}, #{suspensionStatus}, #{loginType}, #{isBannedFromAuction}, #{kakaoId})
mapper.select: SELECT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM users WHERE login_id = #{loginId})
SELECT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM users WHERE nickname = #{nickname})
SELECT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM users WHERE email = #{email})
SELECT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM users WHERE phone_number = #{phoneNumber})
